headline: PPL (PPL) Net Margin Rises to 11.2%, Highlighting Ongoing Profitability Debate
summary: PPL (PPL) reported a 17.5% increase in earnings for the latest year, though this pace came in below its average of 20.9% annual growth over the past five years. Looking forward, PPL is expected to deliver 12% earnings growth and 5% revenue growth per year, both tracking below broader US market averages. Net profit margins improved to 11.2% from 10.2% last year. Investors have seen shares trade at $36.37, reflecting a premium compared to the company's estimated fair value and sector...
